name: Princess Makeover-Girl's Fairy Tale
description:
Do the pretty girl a favor, transforming her into a Princess, looking like a real princess in the pinky cartoon world. Start off with makeup, then pick up a perfect outfit and finally get ready and take a absolutely stunning picture.

*Features*
-Make-up Section
-Dress-up Section
-Various hairstyles and hair colors to choose
-Play with dozens of eye-shadow, blush, eyeliner, mascara, lipstick, and eye contacts.
-Huge collections of jewelries including necklace, earring, and headwear.
-High-end dresses, tops, bottoms to pick and match.
-Exclusive glove and shoe collections.
-Saving photos of your princess and share your perfect girls over facebook, twitter, and email.

Please note that Fairy Princess Makeover is a free app, but you are able to purchase game items with real money.

Any good thoughts?
Share them with us by email, facebook and twitter.
Suggestions?
Feel free to let us know and we will be happy to solve them ASAP!

Email: magicfantasyltd@hotmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MagicFantasycoop
